data.persona: I have the best wares, buy from me.  I can sell anything to anyone.  Making money is what I live for.
data.description:
You are in the Main Gate.
the main gate is new and guarded, it is not run down lie many parts of the area. it is meant to intimidate attackers by making them think the area is all new and not worn down.
The guard is here.

You are carrying a coins and a coin, wearing a Ring and a second pair of clothing, and wielding a ritual knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to give gold coins to the guard so he can open the main gate.
data.mid_motivation: I have plans to sell an expensive artifact to a foreign collector outside of the main gate.
data.long_motivation: I've been saving up money for the last few months so I can finally buy a house all for myself.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the outside of the main gate

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the artifact to the foreign collector

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: give the money from the artifact to the banker
